Getting started

Install with bower

$ bower install framewreck

Modules

framewreck is designed in a module-structure to fulfill certain purposes.
You can either embed single modules or all of them. It's up to your personal needs.

Embed via CDN

You can use this generator to choose from all available modules and generate a dynamic URL or choose from the options below.

Main modules
<script src="//cdn.jsdelivr.net/g/framewreck"></script>

or

All modules
<script src="//cdn.jsdelivr.net/framewreck/latest/framewreck.all.js"></script>

or

Module wise
<script src="//cdn.jsdelivr.net/framewreck/latest/modules/core/fw.core.min.js"></script>
<script>
// asynchronously load other modules
F().require([
		'//cdn.jsdelivr.net/framewreck/latest/modules/animate/fw.animate.min.js',
		'//cdn.jsdelivr.net/framewreck/latest/modules/dom/fw.dom.min.js',
		'...'
	], function() {
		// ...
	});
</script>
